name: If the world were a town of 100 (Ludum Dare 38)
name_original: If the world were a town of 100 (Ludum Dare 38)
description:
The world is a town! You suggest laws over which the people of the world decide. Manipulate the world without actually changing anything.

Choice is only a matter of perspective.

This game was made for the 38th Ludum Dare Game Jam. We created it in less than 72 hours. For this reason not every planned feature made it into the game + some features aren't working properly.

Maybe we'll continue programming it someday and publish it for real.

Developed by
- Sandro Schaier
- Patrick Tobler (Twitter)
- Peter Jaschkowske (Twitter)
